translated: Engberg, Bertil August, assistant hospital doctor, Jönköping, born on February 12, 1904 in Kristianstad to Per Edv^. E. and Bertha Olsso^n. Married in 1930 to Inga Gra-nelH. Children: Ingemar born in 1935, Monica born in 1940. He graduated from Kristianstad with a high school diploma in 1921, a bachelor's degree in medicine in 1925 and a medical license in 1930 in Lund. He worked as temporary doctor in Klippan, Smedjebacken and Eskilstuna districts for a short time in 1930, then as a doctor, temporary assistant and temporary junior doctor at the radiology department in Lund from 1930 to 1932. He was appointed as an assistant and temporary radiologist at the X-ray department in Lund in 1932, and became an assistant there in 1933. He was a temporary radiologist at Kristianstad, Västerås and Jönköping hospitals, as well as at Carlanderska sjukhemm. in Gothenburg in 1934, doctor at the radiology department in Lund in the same year, at the X-ray institute there in 1935, and at the Radiumhemmet in Stockholm in 1936-1937. He was a radiologist at Sollefteå hospital and military hospital from 1937 to 1942, battalion doctor in Norrland Transport Regiment from 1937 to 1941, battalion doctor in Flakdivisjonen (a large unit of the Norwegian army) since 1941, and first junior doctor at the X-ray department in Lund in 1944. He is currently working as an assistant hospital doctor at the X-ray department in Jönköping.
